rows:
[Comment]

Comment post. This thread is specifying the way the software is formatting the drivers' threads.

* All replies not marked [Comment] are picked up by the software, in order,  directly from the post.

New language features in 3.0.0:
* CONTINUE - continues execution at the top of the current loop
* conditional boolean support for some integer variables. Example: _IF &{Consumer.StandardMeals}_

**Variables**

**ThisDriverUserName** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**ThisDriverFirstRestaurantStartTime** ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet
**FirstRestaurantEmoji**   ... string, calculated from restaurant template
**ThisDriverStartTime** ... string, driver's block scope, from control block
**ThisDriverGMapURL**  ... string, driver's block scope, from workflow spreadsheet


**OnCallOpsManager**  ... structure
**.UserName** ... string, workflow spreadsheet scope, from workflow control block
**.Phone** ... string, workflow spreadsheet scope, from workflow control block
**.CompactPhone** ... string, workflow spreadsheet scope, from workflow control block, in format (510) 555.1212
**ThisDriverAnyCondo**  ... boolean, driver's block scope scope, from workflow spreadsheet

**ThisDriverRestaurant**   list, driver's block scope
**.Name** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet and restaurant template
**.Emoji** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Address** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Details**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.StandardMeals** ... integer, totaled from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**.AlternateMeals** ... list, from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**.StandardGroceries** - integer, totaled from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**.AlternateGroceries** ... list, from from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**ThisDriverRestaurant.MealsOrGroceries**  ... boolean, driver block

**ThisDriverRestaurant.AlternateMeals** ... list, driver block scope
**.Type**  ... string, from driver block
**.Count**  ... integer, from driver block

**ThisDriverRestaurant.AlternateGroceries** ... list, driver block scope
**.Type**  ... string, from driver block
**.Count**  ... integer, from driver block

**Consumer**  list, driver's block scope
**.Name** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.UserName** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.CompactPhone** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet, in format (510) 555.1212
**.CompactAltPhone** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet, in format (510) 555.1212
**.IsAltPhone** ... boolean, from workflow spreadsheet (meaning: is there an Alt phone number?)
**.City** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Address** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.IsCondo** ... boolean, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Details**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.Restaurant**  ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.RestaurantEmoji** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.StandardMeal**  ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**.AlternateMeal** ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**.AlternateMealType** ... string, from workflow spreadsheet
**.StandardGrocery** ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**AlternateGrocery** ... integer, from workflow spreadsheet
________________ boolean when used in an IF statement.
**AlternateGroceryType** .. string, from workflow spreadsheet
